```{r fig.width = 7, fig.height = 3, message = FALSE}

bluePalette <- c("#6A98BA","#041E42")

monthly$USDA_cat = ifelse(monthly$USDA01 == 1, "USDA", "FDA")

## Plot of Coefficents
ggplot(monthly, aes(x= import_volume, y= total_refusals, color= USDA_cat)) + 
  geom_point(alpha = 0.8) + 
  labs(x= "", y= "", color= "") +
  theme_bw() +
  scale_color_manual(values=bluePalette)

ggsave("output/figures/analysis/report_importVolumeDiff.png", dpi = 300)
```
